$interpreted: Hunter: ..That's a stranger I've never met before...

Hunter: He wanted Ned and I to take the package to a designated location and exchange packages with someone waiting there. 
We were then to hand the exchanged package to him...

Fredrica: Afterwards, when you two got there, you found out that it was a lizardman who's waiting for you. 
You then exchanged packages with the lizardman before handing it to the aforementioned stranger?
Fredrica: What were the contents of the packages?
Hunter: I only opened the lizardman's package. Inside the package are some valuable treasure and letters...
Lisa: Then you proceeded to steal an item from the package and now Ned is under arrest because of that!
Hunter: I really only took a single bronze medal to sell for extra cash.
Hunter: I have no idea why the Kingdom army went after Ned either. I still have the medal with me. If you guys want it, just take it...
Jerome: Even the lizardman of Desert Kingdom are getting involved. This incident is not as simple as it first appeared.

Fredrica: On top of that, even the Healy family took action...
Handsome, any ideas?
Jerome: The Healy family already arrested Ned, yet they are still searching for this hunter. We can assume that the bronze medal he stole is the key here.
Jerome: We'll use him as bait and see who's going to fall for it.
Fredrica: I expect no less from my officer. We'll go with your idea! Let's keep this a secret for now; we don't want others to know that we already captured him.
Fredrica: Lisa, about your husband, ask your father to keep protesting his arrest.
Fredrica: After all, he is still the son-in-law of the Commerce Chamber's vice president. Not even the Healy family can execute him without proper reasoning~
Fredrica: Once we got the proper info, we can take over from there~
Lisa: Thank you for helping out so much...
Fredrica: You're welcome. If you come across any good men, don't forget to introduce them to me~ Now, go back to your husband.
Fredrica: As for you... go wander around somewhere noticeable and bait those people who're trying to hunt you~
Fredrica: Is he still there?
Jerome: Already told him that if he dared escape, we will stab him in the back. Judging by his cowardly behavior, it's likely he won't disobey us.
Fredrica: Good.  Here's to hope that this incident can end soon. I need to go home and take a shower...
Fredrica: My~ Why are you looking at me like that~Are you thinking about something perverted~

Jerome: I am just trying to figure out the patterns in general's actions...
...you talk in a frivolous manner, act stubbornly, and show not an ounce of seriousness.
Jerome: However, after spending some time with you, those observations don't seem to reflect your true self...
Fredrica: Handsome, a good lady always has her secrets~
Fredrica: We will be working with each other for a long time to come. Won't be too late to gradually know each other down the line~
Hunter: Help!
Healy Family Soldier: Where is the bronze medal!? Speak!
Hunter: Let me explain first!
Healy Family Soldier: Wasting our time. We'll kill you first then search the body!
Fredrica: Handsome! Are you alright!
Jerome: I'm fine! Apprehend these people first!
Fredrica: Hoho, not so fast. BIg Momma has plenty of questions for you little fella~!
Fredrica: You would go as far as attempting to kill me in order to get your hands on the bronze medal.
Fredrica: So, will you mind telling me first just how important that bronze medal is to the Healy family~

Model.Text: ..That's a stranger I've never met before...

He wanted Ned and I to take the package to a designated location and exchange packages with someone waiting there. 
We were then to hand the exchanged package to him...

Afterwards, when you two got there, you found out that it was a lizardman who's waiting for you. 
You then exchanged packages with the lizardman before handing it to the aforementioned stranger?
What were the contents of the packages?
I only opened the lizardman's package. Inside the package are some valuable treasure and letters...
Then you proceeded to steal an item from the package and now Ned is under arrest because of that!
I really only took a single bronze medal to sell for extra cash.
I have no idea why the Kingdom army went after Ned either. I still have the medal with me. If you guys want it, just take it...
Even the lizardman of Desert Kingdom are getting involved. This incident is not as simple as it first appeared.

On top of that, even the Healy family took action...
Handsome, any ideas?
The Healy family already arrested Ned, yet they are still searching for this hunter. We can assume that the bronze medal he stole is the key here.
We'll use him as bait and see who's going to fall for it.
I expect no less from my officer. We'll go with your idea! Let's keep this a secret for now; we don't want others to know that we already captured him.
Lisa, about your husband, ask your father to keep protesting his arrest.
After all, he is still the son-in-law of the Commerce Chamber's vice president. Not even the Healy family can execute him without proper reasoning~
Once we got the proper info, we can take over from there~
Thank you for helping out so much...
You're welcome. If you come across any good men, don't forget to introduce them to me~ Now, go back to your husband.
As for you... go wander around somewhere noticeable and bait those people who're trying to hunt you~
Is he still there?
Already told him that if he dared escape, we will stab him in the back. Judging by his cowardly behavior, it's likely he won't disobey us.
Good.  Here's to hope that this incident can end soon. I need to go home and take a shower...
My~ Why are you looking at me like that~Are you thinking about something perverted~

I am just trying to figure out the patterns in general's actions...
...you talk in a frivolous manner, act stubbornly, and show not an ounce of seriousness.
However, after spending some time with you, those observations don't seem to reflect your true self...
Handsome, a good lady always has her secrets~
We will be working with each other for a long time to come. Won't be too late to gradually know each other down the line~
Help!
Where is the bronze medal!? Speak!
Let me explain first!
Wasting our time. We'll kill you first then search the body!
Handsome! Are you alright!
I'm fine! Apprehend these people first!
Hoho, not so fast. BIg Momma has plenty of questions for you little fella~!
You would go as far as attempting to kill me in order to get your hands on the bronze medal.
So, will you mind telling me first just how important that bronze medal is to the Healy family~
